name: Samantha
text:
Samantha
"Samantha, bring in a fly swatter! There's a bug in my office!"
 ―Benjamin Horne
Samantha was Benjamin Horne's secretary in March 1989.
Biography
Samantha informed the impatient Bobby Briggs that Horne was not expecting him and proposed they set up a meeting for the next month. However, Bobby insisted that Samantha tell Horne that the meeting was about a tape Horne received in the mail recently.
Later, after Bobby was allowed into the office by Audrey Horne, Samantha was asked by Benjamin to send security to retrieve Bobby.
